name: Space space (ginodp2015)
description:
I made this game using 8x8 sprites with only 2 colors, dark green and light green.

Game is very simple, but you need some strategy skills to win.

You are Jack Diamond and you discovered a secret plan of the robot pulps to destroy planet Earth.

So you infiltrated inside their submarine base and you need to make your way to the big boss and destroy it.

Jack's spaceship is controlled like a radiocommand car, use left and right arrows to rotate and chage direction, up to sprit forward, down to put the shield on.

Spaceship will keep a minimum speed, so you need to be very carefull for not to crash into base walls.

Shield is very useful when you are going to be hit from an enemy missile, or crashing into a wall, but once you put it on, it will last for some seconds, and then it will disappear for the recharging time.

Ship's missiles are very powerfull, they can destroy a pulp with only 1 hit. But fire rate is very slow, once you shoot your missile, you'll have to wait some seconds to recharge. For this reason you need to get the maximum precision when you fire to enemies.

Big boss is waiting for you at level 11, you need to hit it 10 times to destroy it. It is able to shoot several missiles in every direction. 

Enjoy!!!
